Start with a tutorialÂ¶

In this section, you will find short tutorials on how to use the different components of the toolkt individually and longer complete tutorial to train and run a speaker verification system on standard tasks such as the RSR2015 database or the NIST Speaker Recognition Evaluation.

  • RSR2015
    • Prepare to run experiments on RSR2015
    • Run a GMM-UBM system
    • Run a SVM-GMM system
  • NIST-SRE 2010
    • Prepare to run experiments on NIST-SRE 2010
    • Run an i-vector system
